title: free passion fruit and coconut cake
description: If you’re looking for a crowd-pleasing gluten-free celebration cake, this could be the one: two layers of passion fruit and coconut cake sandwiched with coconut and lime buttercream.Equipment and preparation: you will need 2 x 20cm/8in springform cake tins and an electric hand-held whisk.
ingredients: 4 passion fruit, pulp and seeds scooped out
2 tsp xanthan gum, available in many large supermarkets or online
2 passion fruit, pulp and seeds scraped out
